Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: sparky
Reviews.Content: not the best phone in the world, only lasted 3 months and froze up would not recomend this phone to anyone it was very cheap so i guess u get what u pay for. but was just as seller described so i guess it would be fine for someone who doesnt use their phone alot

Reviews.Title: Not a bad basic phone
Reviews.Author: Sunny
Reviews.Content: My husband and I both have this phone and it is a decent phone. I have no complaints. If you want a basic phone this is a good pick. Camera is not very good but in terms of phone calls and texting I haven't had any problems.

Reviews.Title: Be Careful What You Buy and Who You Buy It From
Reviews.Author: BUJoeCool
Reviews.Content: The phone I bought did NOT come in the original box, but more importantly it COULD ONLY BE USED AS PRE-PAID (I learned this after trying to get Verizon to activate it on my account to replace a dead phone).  I suppose that depending on which seller you buy from, it could come in the original box and it might be eligible to activate on your Verizon account, but you should probably contact the seller first to be sure.  I am sending mine back for a refund.  I do not want to state which seller I bought it from because so far I have not had any difficulties with the return and do not want to bring any bad karma (I have had enough of that recently).

Reviews.Title: Well its ok.. i guess
Reviews.Author: smartypants21
Reviews.Content: well this phone is not the best there is out there but it will work if your not looking for anything fance. first off, the camera sucks and the vibration is too loud. it has horrible sound.

Reviews.Title: good but i lost and can not find it
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: i loved the phone but it  only has so many apps you can not get addational apps for your phone and i lost it and it does not have an app where you can locate it so i would say buy it but if u lose it not my fault it sucks because that phone had all my contacts and ringtones ad recordings on it so there you go
